DemographicType.Name: BaseGeography
DemographicType.Description: Demographic that represents a geographic attribute

DemographicType.Name: Infrastructure
DemographicType.Description: Demographic that represents infrastructure improvements to geography

DemographicType.Name: Flora
DemographicType.Description: Demographic that represents plant life components

Demographic.Name: Woodlands
Demographic.Description: Populated with trees and some vegetation

DemographicClass.Name: Mountain
DemographicClass.Description: Large, Named Mountain - generally to be used in conjunction with Mountains

DemographicClass.Name: Town
DemographicClass.Description: Urban area smaller than a full tile urban area

DemographicClass.Name: ShoreLineNorth
DemographicClass.Description: Land to the north, water to the south

DemographicClass.Name: ShoreLineSouth
DemographicClass.Description: Land to the South, water to the north

DemographicClass.Name: ShoreLineWest
DemographicClass.Description: Land to the west, water to the east

DemographicClass.Name: ShoreLineEast
DemographicClass.Description: Land to the east, water to the west

DemographicClass.Name: ShoreLineNorthWest
DemographicClass.Description: Land to the northwest, water elsewhere

DemographicClass.Name: ShoreLineNorthEast
DemographicClass.Description: Land to the northeast, water elsewhere

DemographicClass.Name: ShoreLineSouthWest
DemographicClass.Description: Land to the southwest, water elsewhere

DemographicClass.Name: ShoreLineSouthEast
DemographicClass.Description: Land to the southeast, water elsewhere

DemographicClass.Name: Forested
DemographicClass.Description: Dominated with trees and other vegetation

DemographicClass.Name: Woodland
DemographicClass.Description: Populated with trees and other vegetation

UnitGroupType.Name: Company
UnitGroupType.Description: Company - Attack/Defence Unit - Up to 4 platoons

UnitGeogType.Name: Land
UnitGeogType.Description: Units that move on land only

UnitGeogType.Name: Air-AllAltitudes
UnitGeogType.Description: Units that fly at all altitudes

UnitGeogType.Name: Water-Surface
UnitGeogType.Description: Units that move on the surface of water only

UnitGeogType.Name: Air-LowAltitudes
UnitGeogType.Description: Units that fly primarily at low altitudes

UnitGeogType.Name: Water-Sub
UnitGeogType.Description: Units that move under the surface of water

UnitBaseType.Name: Helicopter
UnitBaseType.OutOfFuelMoveResultMessage: landed and can no longer move.

UnitBaseType.Name: Watercraft-Sub
UnitBaseType.OutOfFuelMoveResultMessage: has surfaced and can no longer move.
UnitBaseType.Description: Units that can move on or under water

UnitBaseType.Name: AirDefence
UnitBaseType.Description: Units that defend against air attacks only

MissionType.Name: Scout
MissionType.Description: Scout an area for enemy units
